pageContext.claim: “We achieved the first breakthrough in the Middle East peace, and you saw that two days ago, UAE, Bahrain, Israel, nobody thought it was even possible. … I saw John Kerry on television the other day. ‘It is not possible.’ Now, we waited a little while. He went very, very strong. It is not possible and it was not only possible. We have many countries that are joining us very soon.”
pageContext.analysis: Many of the Arab nations extending diplomatic recognition to Israel have never been at war with the Jewish state. The source of much of the violence remains the conflict between Israel and the Palestinians -- an issue that Trump largely ignored.
